div.div:
DNSSEC Validator
validates the KSKs and ZSKs in a zone with the DS RRs from the parent zone
validates DS RRs with ZSKs
validates sets of RRs with ZSKs

Entrypoint
provides a method to check that either a DS record or a domain name does not exist
